Articles.Content:
Heyo!

First things first: mods, don't murder me for this please!
With that out of the way, here's the post!


So not many of you know about KerbalNations, KerbalStates, KerbalPowers, etc. all kerbal RP's which died off quickly.

Well, Zekes and *insert name here* are trying to start it back up again at [url]http://kerbalworld.lefora.com/[/url]
Ya'll should check it out before land becomes scarce, get your country up and running, make some allies, enemies, friends, etc.


Anyways, hope to see you there!

~Kozak
Quite rude to call a RP which lasted for 4 months at minimum short lived.
4 months is short tho, also, this was a dead thread y revive it? .-.

It's not dead if it was last month. 

Anyhow, how is the RP forum doing?

Well, most big nations besides Halco and Zokesia said screw this and left.

It's pretty much dead if it isn't already.
In fairness, it kinda failed to start right. Sorry that I revived it without checking the date while doing some googling of all RPs.
